an5.226:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks for a mendicant who visits families for too long, mixing closely with them.
an5.226:4.3: You often see members of the opposite sex. Seeing them, you become close. Being so close, you become intimate. Being intimate, lust overcomes you. When your mind is overcome by lust, you can expect that
an5.226:4.4: you will live the spiritual life dissatisfied, or commit one of the corrupt offences, or abandon the training and return to a lesser life.
an5.226:4.5: These are the five drawbacks for a mendicant who visits families for too long, mixing closely with them.”
